raw_body: JAYANTHI SENARATNE (Retired English Trained Teacher – last served at Holy Family Convent,​ Dehiwela). Dearly beloved wife of late Dayananda Withanachchi of Baddegama,​ loving daughter of late Don Robert and Rosalin Senaratne of Panadura /​ Panapitiya,​ much loved sister /​ sister-in-law of Shelton and Hema,​ Victor and Esme,​ Milton and Edith,​ Sunil,​ Godwin and Ira,​ all deceased and of Kalyani Senaratne,​ darling nanda of Chitrica,​ Navina,​ Sanjaya,​ Lalith,​ Thusitha,​ Chandrika,​ Prisanthi,​ Sujeevan,​ Susitha,​ Pradeep,​ Preethika,​ Achala,​ Anusha,​ Hiranthi,​ Charith and Sujeevi. Remains lie at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour Kalubowila from 2.00 p.m. on Tuesday 2nd April. Cremation at 3.00 p.m. at Kohuwala Cemetery on Wednesday 3rd April 2024.        023028
